classifiers: license :: osi approved :: apache software license
description:
a collection of heuristic algorithms for solving the 2d knapsack problem,
also known as the bin packing problem. in essence packing a set of rectangles into the
smallest number of bins.
name: rectpack
kwds:
knapsack,rectangle,packing 2d,bin,binpacking a collection of heuristic algorithms for solving the 2d knapsack problem,
also known as the bin packing problem. in essence packing a set of rectangles into the
smallest number of bins. 2d rectangle packing library
